question: 不人気
sourceMnemonic: You already know <ja>人気</ja> which means "popular." And you also know that <ja>不</ja> means "not." So what do you get when you combine the two? Something that's <vocabulary>not popular</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>unpopular</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
